description:
In the beginnig of summer, Kyoya`s sister Kasumi comes to hang out in the club room. Mao convinces Kasumi she is younger than her and calls herself "Ma-chan." Meanwhile, the members of the GJ Club decide to go to the pool to escape the persistent heat... with Kasumi and her friends.
The names of Kasumi`s friends sound awfully familiar...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シスターズ・アタック!
